abstract: The distribution spat between the Walt Disney Company and the cable provider Cablevision is starting to look more like a spat between two chief executives.
snippet: The distribution spat between the Walt Disney Company and the cable provider Cablevision is starting to look more like a spat between two chief executives.
lead_paragraph: The distribution spat between the Walt Disney Company and the cable provider Cablevision started to look more like a spat between two chief executives on Friday, one day before Cablevision’s contract to carry the ABC station in New York City was set to expire.

headline.main: Disney-Cablevision Dispute Takes a Personal Turn

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Brooks Barnes

abstract: The companies, which are negotiating a new deal involving WABC in New York, exchanged critical statements on Friday.
snippet: The companies, which are negotiating a new deal involving WABC in New York, exchanged critical statements on Friday.
lead_paragraph: The distribution spat between The Walt Disney Company and Cablevision started to look more like a spat between two chief executives on Friday, a day before Cablevision’s contract to carry the ABC station in New York City was set to expire.

headline.main: Disney and Cablevision Snipe at Chiefs in Contract Talks
headline.print_headline: Disney and Cablevision Snipe At Chiefs in Contract Talks

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Brooks Barnes

abstract: Three million cable customers in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut will lose their ABC station early Sunday morning unless companies either strike a deal or extend their tense contract negotiations.
snippet: Three million cable customers in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut will lose their ABC station early Sunday morning unless companies either strike a deal or extend their tense contract negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Three million cable customers in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut will see their ABC station go to black (or something like it) early Sunday morning unless The Walt Disney Company and Cablevision either strike a deal or extend their tense contract negotiations.
